```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
dietHabits <- read_delim("Dietary Habits Survey Data.csv")

dietHabits <- dietHabits %>%
  select(Age, Gender, Diet Type, Weekly food intake [Sweet foods], Weekly food intake [Salty foods])
```
